page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: People who live in our block attend various clubs such as{Boys' Brigades in Kilraughts and Ballyweaney Churches or the{Girls' Brigade}in Ballyweaney. Churches around our area also have badminton and bowling clubs where both men and women play. Young people over 12 years old go to the{Young Farmers' Club}at Kilraughts. There they learn Public Speaking and all about farming. Many ladies go to the{Women's Institute}in Armoy which is a kind of get together. Roman Catholics have a hurling club and a {Gaelic Football}team in Loughguile. There are plenty of opportunities in our area for people, both old and young, to belong to some type of club.
